attributes.action: Nigel Farage should resign and pay back all his EU salary
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage has destroyed our country's reputation as he stands up in the European Parliament and abuses other members for all to see. He should be banned from entering the parliament again, should resign his position and pay back every penny he ever took as salary.
attributes.background: Ban Nigel Farage from the EU Parliament and insist he pays back all of his MEP salary.
